description: This table stores single response items for temporary hospital billing transactions. This table is limited to charge temporary transactions that have not yet been posted to the account.

columns.name: HTT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: TX_TYPE_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item indicates the type of temporary transaction record. This is used by the Hospital Billing filer to determine how to process the record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CHARGE


Payment


Debit Adjustment


Credit Adjustment


Placeholder - Not Used


Action - Initiate Billing


Action - Undo Billing


Action - Late Charge Replacement


Action - Next Responsible Party


Action - Undo Next Responsible Party


Action - Late Charge Write Off


Action - Interim Billing


Action - Late Charge Addition


Action - Transfer to Self Pay


Action - Undo NRP and TTSP


Action - Initiate Homing


Action - Interim Homing


Action - Initiate RAP


Action - Undo all Billing, NRP, and TTSP actions


Action - Send to Separate Billing Service Area


Action - Return from Separate Billing Service Area


Action - Initiate Notice of Hospice Election


Action - Initiate Notice of Hospice Revocation


Action - Split Mixed HAR


Action - Admission Day Billing


Action - Secondary RAP


Action - Duplicate and Send Charges


Action - Run HB Pricing Contracts


Action - Undo NRP Back to Selected Bucket


Action - DBC Send Partial Denial to Self-Pay


Action - DBC Ignore Partial Denial


Action - Evaluate Bad Debt/External AR for Bucket

columns.name: TX_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the source for this transaction. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Transaction Import


Interface


EpicCare


Daily Charge


Bed Charge


Batch Charge Entry


Unit Charge Entry


Payment Posting


Adjustment Posting


Post Adjustment - Account Maintenance


Reverse Transaction - Account Maintenance


Reversal and Repost


Charge Correction


Order Trigger


Transfer Transaction


Combine Accounts


Electronic Remittance


HB Only Quick Payment Posting


Account Maintenance - Actions


Revenue Reclassification - Account Class Change


Revenue Reclassification - Financial Class Change


Claims Accept - Bucket Split


Small Balance Write-Off


System Auto Action


Hourly Charge


Expected Not-Allwd-Auto Write-Off


Claim Denial Payment


Willow Inpatient


Refund - Account Maintenance


OpTime


Radiant


MyChart Web


Inpatient


Resolute Professional Billing


Emergency Dept


Home Health


Lab


Cohort


Enterprise Payment Posting


Charge Router Charge Entry


Self-Pay Discount


Payment Collection


Late Fee


Tx Report - Add Corresponding Charge


Patient Refund


Welcome


Cardiology


Obstetrics


Handheld


Late Charge Write-Off


Hospice Per Diem


Hospice


Surcharge


Adjustment Import


DBC Product


DBC Accepted Invoice


Willow Ambulatory


Anesthesia


Reverse Transaction - Tx Report


Billing Activity


Web Service


HB Coding


Auto Pay Payment Plan


Distribution


Duplicated Charge


Billing Charge Write-Off


Transaction Classification Balancing


Financial Assistance


Cumulative Billing


MyChart Mobile


Pay as Guest


Unbilled Expected Write-Off


DBC Denied Invoice


Bundle Payment Distribution


DBC Denied Invoice - Ignored


Balance Transfer In


Balance Transfer Out


Balance Correct In


Balance Correct Out


Visit Auto Pay


Trust Transfer


Trust Recurring Payment


Notification Billing


Advance Billing


Two-Way SMS

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: Stores the service area associated with the transaction.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: Stores the hospital account associated with the transaction.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Patient CSN associated with the transaction.

columns.name: RESEARCH_STUDY_ID
columns.description: The research study associated with the transaction.

columns.name: RSH_CHG_ORIG_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: Stores the hospital account for the patient enrolled in the research study, which the charges were generated from before being billed to the study account.

columns.name: SERVICE_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the performing provider associated with the transaction.

columns.name: BILLING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The override provider under whom these charges will be billed.

columns.name: COST_CENTER_ID
columns.description: Stores the cost center to which this transaction is being attributed.

columns.name: COST_CENTER_ID_COST_CENTER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the cost center.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The date of service or deposit associated with the transaction.

columns.name: REFUND_AP_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date on which the A/P system processed the transaction.

columns.name: REFUND_AP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the action taken by the A/P system when it processed the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Approved


Rejected

columns.name: ACCT_CLASS_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the account class of the account when offsetting system adjustments are created. For all other transactions, this item is not set and instead the corresponding posted transaction values are calculated at the time of filing.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACCT_FIN_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the financial class of the account when offsetting system adjustments are created.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Commercial


Medicare


Medicaid


Self-Pay


Worker's Comp


Tricare


Champva


Group Health Plan


FECA Black Lung


Blue Shield


Medigap


Other


DK Regional


Client

columns.name: PRIMARY_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: Holds the primary coverage of the account when offsetting system adjustments are created.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PAYER_ID
columns.description: Holds the primary payer of the account when offsetting system adjustments are created.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PAYER_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PLAN_ID
columns.description: Holds the primary plan of the account when offsetting system adjustments are created.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: TOTAL_CHARGE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total price amount for the charges in this session.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the order associated with the charge.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the treatment plan that generated this charge session and order.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DAY_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the treatment day that generated this charge session's order.

columns.name: OPTIME_LOG_ID
columns.description: Stores the identifier of the OpTime Log associated with this charge.

columns.name: SYS_RECLASS_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reclassification reason for a transaction reposted for system reasons.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Financial Class Change


Account Class Change


Primary Payor or Plan Change


Mark/Unmark Account for Seperate SA Billing


Surcharge Recalculation


Pricing Contract Reprice


Forced Repost


Rev Code/Non-Covered Flag/Price Change


Bundled Episode Change


Register Number Change


Fee Decision Change

columns.name: REVERSAL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the reversal reason. This is set for all transaction types.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


CCI Edit


No Supporting Documentation


Service Not Performed


Payment Received


Returned Mail


Other


Duplicate


Posted in Error


Wrong Code


Give Back

columns.name: CONTEST_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the contested reason. This is set only for charges.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Account Has Contested Charges


Patient Not Seen


Bankruptcy


Legal


Deceased


Not Informed Service Not Covered


Service Not Provided


Insurance Appeal


Patient Grievance


Other

columns.name: CONTEST_RESOLUTION_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the resolution reason. This is set only for charges.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Transfer


All Charges Resolved


Contested in Error


Confirmed Billed Correctly


Patient No Longer Contesting


Insurance Issue Resolved


Problem Fixed

columns.name: NO_PAY_CLAIM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
If this charge was posted to drive no-pay claims to be generated, this charge is intended to file and bill immediately. These claims will have different types/purposes. This column defines the type of claim that should be generated for the bucket that holds this charge.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


SNF No-Pay Claim


SNF Exhaust Claim


HH No-Pay RAP


HH Notice of Admission

columns.name: BAD_DEBT_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
This column marks the account's A/R as belonging to bad debt.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active AR


External Agency AR


Bad Debt


Outsourced

columns.name: POS_SESSION_IDENT
columns.description: Point of Sale session ID.

columns.name: POS_TX_IDENT
columns.description: Point of Sale transaction ID.

columns.name: POS_TX_LINENUM
columns.description: Point of Sale transaction line number.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_PERCENT
columns.description: This item stores the discount percentage applied to the self-pay balance.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_PROGRAM_ID
columns.description: This item stores the financial assistance program that the hospital account qualified for which caused the financial assistance adjustment to be applied.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_PROGRAM_ID_PROGRAM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the financial assistance program record.

columns.name: TAX_EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date used in the system that determine when this tax line went into effect.

columns.name: TAXABLE_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the amount that the tax is applied to.

columns.name: TAX_PERCENT
columns.description: Percent used to calculate the tax amount.

columns.name: TAX_AMOUNT
columns.description: This column stores the amount used for the tax.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the claim print record associated with the surcharge amount of this transaction.

columns.name: TAX_RATE_DEF_CSN
columns.description: The tax rate definition CSN used in the tax calculation.

columns.name: DEFAULT_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department that was defaulted in for the transaction.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: The place of service ID associated with this transaction.

columns.name: EXTERN_AR_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
This column marks the account's A/R as belonging to an agency.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: BAD_DEBT_FLAG_YN
